summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of ALASKAN WAY, southwesterly side only, from University Street to lenora Street, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6584, authorized by Ordinance No. 101893; repealing Ordinance No. 101894, which appropriates money from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund in aid of said Local Improvement District.
